name: REPLACE_ME
description: Starter project to build an SVG icon library

scripts.build:library: npm run transform-icons && npm run copy-library-assets
scripts.build:showcase: npm run build:library && npm run bundle-showcase && npm run copy-showcase-files
scripts.copy-showcase-files: cpx showcase/index.html dist/showcase && cpx showcase/styles.css dist/showcase
scripts.copy-library-assets: cpx package.json dist/icons && cpx README.md dist/icons

author: Kevin Kreuzer
